exact-comment-date.name: Show Exact Comment Dates (read info)
exact-comment-date.description:
## Highly experimental feature
Shows full comment dates in YYYY-MM-DD using the GDHistory Date Estimator (online). Not fully accurate yet.
The comment date database is not complete yet, so estimates from the equivalent of today's date x years ago to September 1st of the same year will be highly inaccurate. This means that as of the time of addition of this feature all dates between xxxx-02-25 and xxxx-09-01 cannot be trusted yet.
